website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight boot that doesn't skimp on support and traction.
pros: This boot deals well with all seasons, and its waterproofing is so reliable that you can submerge the boot without getting soaked
The durable sole should last you through several seasons
cons: Some customers report that the stitches separate and the leather cracks over time

customer_reviews.title: If what I've done hasn't destroyed them...
customer_reviews.text: ...then you should be set! These boots are incredibly comfortable! I've been wearing these boots for almost four years, and they still feel just as sturdy and supportive as the day I first pulled them on. And I don't (just) wear them out and about... My boots have been on my feet during multiple deployments, everywhere from the sandbox of the Middle East to the jungles of South America, as well as multiple urban areas, and even the floodwaters of Texas disasters (twice).
customer_reviews.author: M.R. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift. He wore them a few times that winter season and then went to wear them again the next winter and the fabric near the toe where the boot bends when you walk had dried out and cracked open. Obviously, now they are neither warm nor waterproof. This was very disappointing considering what I paid and also considering that he said that out of all of the boots he owns (e.g., work, snow, casual), these were by far the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leah E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hiking boot with great ankle support and stability
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hiking boot with great ankle support and stability. I've had my right ankle reconstructed and need support from my shoes and boots. These boots provided the support I need. They are very lightweight, have a superb lacing system, offer excellent traction, and are very water proof due to the Gore Tex liner. They are a little warm for summer wear (>85 F) with the Gore Tex version. I'm going to purchase a pair without the Gore Tex liner for summer wear. Overall, a very sturdy built boot that is very comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Extreme Dementia

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: these boots fell apart first time hunting.do yourself a favor and buy irish setter elk trackers those boots held up 5 years in the back country.they are heavier but worth it.these boots are complete junk.for 200 bucks they didnt last 1 week of hunting
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Super light and comfortable, with plenty of traction and ankle support. I was skeptical at first, but these boots are the best i have ever owned. After trying nearly every other brand, I purchased this pair of Lowa boots and never looked back. I wear mine for work every day in mud, dirt, water and rocks. They have hiked and walked hundreds of miles of trail, road, and woods. With occasional cleaning and treatment, these boots will last (and stay waterproof) for years.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hoger

customer_reviews.title: I have narrow feet and it can be a struggle ...
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow feet and it can be a struggle to find boots that I won't get blisters hiking steep grades. I also had ruptured my Achilles tendon a year ago and wanted something that was both lightweight and gave extra stability. I went to a local outdoors outfitter and tried on boots from Vasque, La Sportiva, Merrel and Keen. These boots fit right out of the box, no break-in time at all; they were snug but not uncomfortable. Unfortunately They were out of my size at the moment and I was travelling and Amazon was able to fulfill my order in a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: michael gall

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I have been spoiled by the quality of L a s p o r t i v a brand boots. They seem to run about a half size small. These are very light weight boots and simply have not stood up as well as the other brand I have been used to wearing. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: CHILLER717

customer_reviews.title: I have Lowa low and thought they were the greatest, until I got the GTX Mid
customer_reviews.text: I have Lowa low and thought they were the greatest, until I got the GTX Mid. I've now worn them for a couple months. Perfect fit, break in almost instantly, great ankle support. And although it doesn't much matter to me, they look cool (anthracite) too.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Awful quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased while overseas on October 17th 2017, got back to Florida mid December. Literally wore these boots 3 times to break in....suede leather on left boot has split already, and was told they are out of warranty. Absolutely no impact has been received on this boot....Absolutely disgusted in the quality. Would 100% not purchase again!!! Never experienced this in Lowa boot....
customer_reviews.author: lyndon b.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boots
customer_reviews.text: Initially I received a defective product that ripped open on the outside of the right boot after month of use. These five stars are for Lowa webpage customer service, that will send out a new pair after receiving pictures of boot failure. Thanks for your help, THE BEST customer service I ever interacted with.
customer_reviews.author: pupimir1981

customer_reviews.title: Second pair of lowa zephyrs
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of Zephyrs. Decided to get these instead of the non-lined zephyr. I'd rather have the non-lined version for any activity over 50deg, as the gor-tex can really heat the boot up. Update: These just didn't stand up as well as my last pair. The leather quickly degraded, the tread wore fast. For the price there are better boots avaliable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E

customer_reviews.title: good hiking shoes, but buy-it 1/2 inch bigger!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how other people wear it, but I typ. wear-it true size Us 13 and I ordered size us 14 and fits perfectly with little space for socks, so the true size is 1/2 size smaller!!! I purchased based on my previous Lowa shoe experience. The shoe is narrow and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nerijus Bandzevicius

customer_reviews.title: Boots are very comfortable, and require no break in time
customer_reviews.text: Boots are very comfortable, and require no break in time. I wore them all day at work right out of the box and had no issues. I normally wear a wide boot and these are a bit tight and long in the toe box. One negaitive thay i fpund and prevented me from giving them 5 stars is that there is an area of stitching that rubs the side of my toe wrong and is painful so I will have to send them back to Lowa. Despite the issue with the stitching these boots are solid and worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Adamoyurka

customer_reviews.title: Great boots. I use these for hunting
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I use these for hunting. I went through thick mud and some water and nothing got through. They are very comfortable on the ankles. And that's important for me. Great boot.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Reil

customer_reviews.title: Lowa Zephyrs = great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Lowa Zephyrs for 5 years now. They fit like a dream and feel amazing from day one. They respond well to rigorous wear, but they will show wear-and-tear. For a hike, ruck, or stroll, they won't let you down. I just wouldn't hike/ruck with fifty or more pounds often. They will respond well to it, but after continuous use like that (deployment perhaps) the plastic on the bottom will begin to wear away after a few months ( around 5 to 6). I have owned four pairs, three mids and one high top; all were 100% worth it and put through hell. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: These boots look and feel fine. My only issue is that the color is ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots look and feel fine. My only issue is that the color is very light gray, not at all like the image online. Not a big deal, just a detail. They are comfortable, solid, and seem as if they will last. I have only had them for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Simoes

customer_reviews.title: On my 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: Have put 100 miles on one pair in one month. Not the slightest hint of a blister. Great boots.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalobwana

customer_reviews.title: These boots are fantastic! When I received the shipment
customer_reviews.text: These boots are fantastic! When I received the shipment, I thought they forgot to boots in the box because it was so light!!! I have been wearing these for a couple of weeks now and every day they feel better as they mold to my foot shape. So far, I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jim McBride

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, color off a little bit
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought these boots for mountain patrols. He loves them, he just wishes they were the right shade of coyote brown for the new Army uniform.
customer_reviews.author: F Morales

customer_reviews.title: I love Lowa shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Lowa shoes. They run small but I already knew that (I typically need a 12.5 US, which means I have to usually choose between a 12 or 13. For these I have to buy a 14) The stitching where the toe part meets the sides on all of my Lowa hikers give out rather quickly. The stitching on these broke within the first month.
customer_reviews.author: George Hein

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Order 1/2 to 1 size bigger than you ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Order 1/2 to 1 size bigger than you would normally wear as they run a bit tight especially if your feet swell while hiking and you wear thick boot socks. I had to return the first pair because they were a little tight. I almost didn't do it because I figured they would break in but I'm glad I changed them for a bigger pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Wider gore-tex boot for warm areas
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter to replace Lowa boots she's worn most of four years. Needed to go into men's sizes to get sufficient width; we'll see how they adapt to her over time. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cesidio V. Barberis

customer_reviews.title: I really like Lowa Hikeing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like Lowa Hikeing shoes, I wear a pair in my shop all day and change to another pair to go out at night
customer_reviews.author: R. Elias

customer_reviews.title: These boots are nothing short of amazing. There was only one problem
customer_reviews.text: These boots are nothing short of amazing. There was only one problem. I ordered the Sage/olive version of these boots. Instead what I got was a tan colored desert boot. I have continued to use them because truthfully the boot is amazing. However, the drag is I cannot use the boot while in uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Medic Cook

customer_reviews.title: Lowa Zephyr is one of the best boots I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Lowa Zephyr is one of the best boots I ever owned. My first pair lasted two years with no noticeable breakdown. Soles still have some tread left but for rocks it was time for a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Groth

customer_reviews.title: The fabric tore very soon
customer_reviews.text: After going on one hike for 7 days, the fabric on one shoe tore - I did not expect the fabric of this quality of shoe to tear that easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The boot was perfect beyond that
customer_reviews.text: Was sent the wrong color, and returned it. The boot was perfect beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Until now,the most confortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit very good,perfect. When I go fishing I take it all day,feel no tired.Much more comfortable than Newbalance 1569,Now I take it every day every occation.Nice and confortable boot.I will buy Lowa again.Thanks for Lowa.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Z.

customer_reviews.title: Like the shoes but make sure you buy half size ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the shoes but make sure you buy half size bigger. Only fit as expected cause I know from previous pair I had. Other than that easy to no break- in.
customer_reviews.author: MXZGUY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots-comfortable right out of box for hours on end.
customer_reviews.author: Drizztace25

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I have ever used. This is my 10th pair of Zephyrs
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I've ever owned. Fit right out of the box--no break in period needed to where all day. Perfect for good ankle support/protection yet not too rigid.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Bast

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in Afghanistan and the terrain here is rough. I had some Merrill's and they just were not doing the job. These bootsod in this environment are the best boots I ever had. I feel as if I am wearing a sneaker boot which are very supportive. I never feel like I will sprain my ankle when walking over rocks and such. I feel confident when I walk and feel go about it. If you want a tactical boot that keeps your feet cool. This is the boot for you. Great job designing this boot!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Macio Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great boots for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very high quality and fit well enough that they are now my daily footwear. If you are looking for a good set of boots for daily wear or light to moderate hiking you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dean

customer_reviews.title: No Break-in Period
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable boots I've ever bought straight out of the box; no break in period at all. The only negative I have about them is that after a month or so, they became the squeakiest boots I've ever owned. I don't really care but you can sure hear me coming in a quiet place from a ways away.
customer_reviews.author: Cts

customer_reviews.title: Fit was Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Ran small for my Size 13 D foot ....returned them. Nice boot ... just narrow fit. Other brands fit true to size. Think it is indeed the boot and not my foot that was the problem here
customer_reviews.author: Kodabow

customer_reviews.title: Great light boot with arch support
customer_reviews.text: After trashing my feet for so many years wearing basketball court shoes, I needed a similar replacement with some support. This boot got high marks within the top 5 light hiking boot category on the internet reviews. I've had them for over a month, and live in the mountains of Colorado. They are comfortable, sturdy, and grip the terrain well. I can wear them up to 16 hours and they still feel comfortable. I don't know how long they will be available, since they are made in "Slovakia", but at least it isn't China. I believe I'll get my money out of them.
customer_reviews.author: co1353

customer_reviews.title: Favorite boots so far
customer_reviews.text: Went a half size up and they are so comfortable! Great looking boot and a great fit! Very light too
customer_reviews.author: The Hollander Family

customer_reviews.title: Lowa Zephyr GTX Boots
customer_reviews.text: After reading previous reviews I decided to buy my boots half a size larger than usual. They feel great and look even better. I hope they perform as good as they look!
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-level boot
customer_reviews.text: These Lowa boots fit well and were comfortable to wear right out of the box. I found a brown pair of the same model in a local store and prefer that color. They are perfect for the level of hiking that I do. I will be returning these boots, although they fit the same and would have done the job, also.
customer_reviews.author: RAF

customer_reviews.title: I feel good,but somewhat big
customer_reviews.text: I feel good, a little hot .Because my feet are a little wide, so the shoe feels a bit thin. I do not think it is the ideal for hot climate conditions.
customer_reviews.author: gaogaogao1982

customer_reviews.title: These are the best shoe I know of
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoe I know of. I climb trees in thes 5 days a week and also use them on the weekend. That are light, exceptionally durable, exceptionally comfortable, and very good traction. I go through a pair every 6 months and every part of the shoe wears out at the same speed.
customer_reviews.author: ARDEN L ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Solid pair of hiking shoe. Seamless sole construction and the overall material feels great! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: alec goh

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Did buy a half size larger than I normally ware but this isn't unusual. Lighter and more comfortable than my old Vasque boots. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: 1st time I tried them on, I noticed they had good arch support and looked exactly as shown. They appear to be well built as would be expected from the Lowa brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gilligan

customer_reviews.title: the most comfortable boots that I have bought in YEARS
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, the most comfortable boots that I have bought in YEARS.
customer_reviews.author: jessee

customer_reviews.title: good boots
customer_reviews.text: So far these are light weight and fit well. They feel great on my feet, of course I am still breaking them in but right out of the box they felt good.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hall

customer_reviews.title: A very good boot
customer_reviews.text: This is the best boot I have used. It fits very well and is very solid. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Sanaknaki

customer_reviews.title: Also good for urban canadian winter
customer_reviews.text: As advertised warm, mid-weight hiking boots. Also good for urban canadian winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Foley

customer_reviews.title: Nothing on the market provides better support for it's size
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of the Zephyr GTX mid. Nothing on the market provides better support for it's size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: absolutely fantastic footwear!
customer_reviews.text: Used them out of the BOX for tactical training last weekend: absolutely fantastic footwear!
customer_reviews.author: John Lock

customer_reviews.title: feels like a waterproof basketball sneakers
customer_reviews.text: feels like a waterproof basketball sneakers. very comfortable. they hold my ankle really nice. the sole grip is not as good as the vibrate, however i can't complain coz i got it for a very good bargain. these shoes has MSRP of $200 (bought it of $120) and the one with vibrate sole has MSRP of $210.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Nurhasan

customer_reviews.title: Love at first wear
customer_reviews.text: Great pair. Fits perfectly, the comfort of putting it on is priceless. Will not look for any other than Lowa.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad Sazali

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots on amazon ofc and spent lavishly on them, $160-180? Well after it’s all said and done I still wear them and it is now 2019. My old review on them was whack. These are actually pretty good and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: crip

customer_reviews.title: Not new boots
customer_reviews.text: Are the shoes new? Have worn before,obvious trace of brush,i don't know what happened,but the first time such a bad experience
customer_reviews.author: mashuo

customer_reviews.title: Expert crafting, just sized a bit small.
customer_reviews.text: Everything I wear is size 12d. All through the marines I wore size 12D boots. Lowa's are super light and are expertly crafted, but their sizing is a tad small.
customer_reviews.author: The Richardsons

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction
customer_reviews.text: So, first off- I was really excited for these boots and tried them on at REI before purchasing. I got them a couple of days before I left for Kenya and wore them around. If I'm wearing thicker boot socks, then they are a bit tight on the toes. Otherwise, the fit is pretty good. However, I have already had a problem with these. The stitching on the inside of the right shoe has started to come apart near the big toe. I have super glued them, but am unfortunately in Kenya for two more months with boots that are falling apart. Buyer, beware.
customer_reviews.author: Phil L

customer_reviews.title: It's good as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I heard 'In Asian, Zephyr's width is a little small'. so I sellect one more long size. It fit as expected. especially, I satisfied that my feet is comport and very few fatigue after long time weared it. now, I'm searching another product of Lowa's - such as running shoes and winter boots Unfortunately, My dear Amazon does not have all kind of Lowa's product. Thank you for reading this.
customer_reviews.author: Kwang Seon Jin

customer_reviews.title: Lowa Zephyr
customer_reviews.text: Lowa Zephyr very good shoes, very soft and comfortable, pleasant to walk in then. I would recommend them to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier wI think these boots. The only con I have is the loop on the heel is entirely too small. The fit is perfect, they breath great, I love these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi-Yah

customer_reviews.title: I Got the Wrong Size.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots to operate hard, and I did, indeed, operate hard. Right up until I couldn't feel my feet because my toes were not in the right place. Solution? Buy size twelve boots, like I've been doing, until I decided to buy the wrong size, aforementioned boots. Good boots, though.
customer_reviews.author: AlyStardew

customer_reviews.title: They changed the fit.
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is too shallow for my foot. I have an older model of this shoe that is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B.

customer_reviews.title: Wet sponges wrapped around your feet
customer_reviews.text: These boots are for strictly dry areas. The GoreTex does not work at all. Just walking thru wet grass makes you feel like you have wet sponges wrapped around your feet. I wasn't even in real puddles and they soaked up water like mad.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Field

customer_reviews.title: I made the big a mistake and used the inserts recommended by other reviewers
customer_reviews.text: This boot weighs as much as a full size boot, don't let the mid label fool you. Additionally do not take other reviewers advise by adding sole inserts unless you absolutely know that you need inserts. I made the big a mistake and used the inserts recommended by other reviewers. After a 5 mile hike I was in misery. Also I experienced rubbing on the inside and outside just above the ankle so the zero break-in period went right out the window there. I haven't had the opportunity to hike in them without the inserts so I will reserve my final judgment until then. Very disappointed so far though.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT O'DONNELL

customer_reviews.title: Busted first time out
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots....comfortable and light. Bought them for a trip to Argentina and they blew out first day...it's a shame I love the boots but that's poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Saibot Yhtraccm

product_meta.title: Lowa Men's Zephyr GTX Mid Hiking Boot
product_meta.description: For close to 90 years, LOWA boots have been acclaimed by climbers, mountaineers and hikers as the finest outdoor boots in the world. Every LOWA boot is handcrafted in Europe, where they incorporate the elements of thoughtful design, superb materials, clean manufacturing processes and fair labor standards. When you own a pair of LOWAs, you can be confident that you're wearing authentic outdoor footwear that "walks the talk" when it comes to quality, performance and sustainability.
feature_bullets: Lace-up hiking boot featuring waterproof and breathable Gore-Tex XCR inserts
